Hello World |

Summary of Apple Event on 9 Sept 2014 

Updated 

– iPhone 5S is 4″. 7.6mm thin.
– iPhone 6 is  4.7″. 6.9mm thin. Read: http://www.apple.com/iphone-6/
– iPhone 6+ is 5.5″. 7.1mm thin
– iPhone 6 & 6+ have A8 chip, M8 chip. Better camera. Included barometer. Better battery. faster processing speed. Comes with 128GB.
Read: http://www.apple.com/iphone/compare/

Important dates are:
– 12 Sept  – iPhone 6 & 6+ pre-order
– 16 Sept for iOS 8 update
– 19 Sept – iPhone 6 & 6+ available in Singapore and other countries.

#Pay
– TouchID was created for ApplePay. The beauty of touchID is that the transaction is between you, merchant and bank. ApplePay SDK for developers.

#Watch
– You will need an iPhone to use AppleWatch.
– Timing is highly precise. 50ms+-.
– AppleWatch can work with iPhone 5/5c onwards.
– You can use AppleWatch to do ApplePay.
– AppleWatch uses Magnetic charging.
– Use watch crown and finger to navigate AppleWatch.
– AppleWatch can detect heartbeat using sensor.
– 6 different watch strap with different material and colors.
– 3 types of AppleWatch: Watch, Watch Sport, Watch Edition.

Read: http://www.apple.com/watch/apple-watch-edition/

For developers: WatchKit SDK

More

iPhone 6 Ad: http://www.apple.com/iphone-6/films/#video-product

Watch Ad: http://www.apple.com/watch/films/#film-design

iTune Ad: http://www.apple.com/U2/#play
